name: Lights Will Guide You Home (I)
achievementgroup: Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I

stage1.title: Lights Will Guide You Home (I)
stage1.description: Follow 4 Seelie to their Seelie Courts on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

stage2.title: Lights Will Guide You Home (I)
stage2.description: Follow 8 Seelie to their Seelie Courts on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

stage3.title: Lights Will Guide You Home (I)
stage3.description: Follow 16 Seelie to their Seelie Courts on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.
